subtitle: These gooey chicken wings are great as a dinner party starter, or as hors d'oeuvres for a buffet when entertaining larger numbers. Don't forget to provide serviettes!

method.text: Heat the oil in a frying pan. Gently fry onion and garlic for 1-2 min, until softened but not browned.
Mix in the tomato puree, vinegar, honey, thyme, mustard, Worcestershire sauce and chicken stock. Season. Simmer for 10-15 min.
Place the chicken wings in a shallow ovenproof dish and pour over the sauce. Cover and chill overnight.
Place the marinated chicken wings on a baking tray and brush with some of the sauce. Cook in oven for 10 min. Baste wings and return to oven for 5-10 min, until cooked through.

title: Spicy chicken wings
